verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's personal lawyer , Michael Cohen ,] [V: contacted] [ARG1: the drug giant Novartis] [ARGM-TMP: after the 2016 election] " [ARGM-ADV: promising access " to the new administration] , and Special Counsel Robert Mueller later requested information from the company about the offer , a senior official inside Novartis told NBC News on Wednesday.</p >

< p > President Donald Trump 's personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , contacted the drug giant Novartis after the 2016 election " promising access " to the new administration , and [ARG0: Special Counsel Robert Mueller] [ARGM-TMP: later] [V: requested] [ARG1: information] [ARG2: from the company] [C-ARG1: about the offer] , a senior official inside Novartis told NBC News on Wednesday.</p >

[ARG1: < p > President Donald Trump 's personal lawyer , Michael Cohen , contacted the drug giant Novartis after the 2016 election " promising access " to the new administration , and Special Counsel Robert Mueller later requested information from the company about the offer] , [ARG0: a senior official inside Novartis] [V: told] [ARG2: NBC News] [ARGM-ADV: on Wednesday.</p] >
